Text: .@gfherald editorial reinforces what I've long said - renegotiating or withdrawing from NAFTA could hurt ND's agriculture economy. I'll keep pushing to make sure that doesn't happen.https://goo.gl/yrM2za

Open enrollment is now until December 15. This @gfherald op-ed by former Congressman Pomeroy highlights why it's important you look into your options & make sure you and your family are covered.https://goo.gl/a9qm7w
Met w/North Dakotans from the National Biodiesel Board to talk about the importance of a strong RFS that supports ND producers.pic.twitter.com/mPaDr8Q2DG
Joined my colleagues in the U.S. Senate to write letters of thanks and appreciation to our servicemembers & I encourage folks to do the same this holiday season.pic.twitter.com/IoQh55pveq
Met w/@myUND's Research Institute for Autonomous Systems to hear updates on its work to research & develop UAS technology in Grand Forks & NDpic.twitter.com/yHCR7IPB59
Honored to receive @goFAAR's leadership award for my work against drunk driving & underage drinking. Appreciate its work to promote responsibility & safetypic.twitter.com/soryTDD3hG

Have long said I want to work with Rs & Ds, including WH, on tax reform. Still working to see if we can find bipartisan path for bill so it supports ND. Voted against motion to proceed on Republican tax reform proposal b/c I still haven’t seen the final bill.

Thanks to all the folks that helped raise awareness about the violence Native American women face & epidemic of missing & murdered Native women. Please keep it up - we can only start working toward real change when this issue is brought out of the shadows #NotInvisible #MMIW

November is National Native American Heritage Month – show your support for Indian Country & help raise awareness about the violence Native American women face by posting a photo holding a sign that says #NotInvisible. #MMIWpic.twitter.com/qdgPlVQXeG

Lindsay Vivier White from Turtle Mountain was friendly and outgoing - but her life was cut short and her family now lives with unanswered questions. This should not be happening in America. #NotInvisible #MMIW https://goo.gl/iq9Lyu pic.twitter.com/qoCQJHj1ZG

The crisis of missing & murdered Native American women has gone on ignored for too long. Read more about my work to combat it, including Savanna's Act, in my @gfherald op-ed & help raise awareness using #NotInvisible.https://goo.gl/P8osR8

Young Native American women like Lakota are robbed of their bright future, and we must put a stop to it. These woman are #NotInvisible. We must raise awareness about & stop these crimes from happening. #MMIW https://goo.gl/zYKtbz pic.twitter.com/Gc6H7Qdnyd

#NotInvisible effort and my bill, Savanna's Act, are about giving a voice to these voiceless women & making sure we stop the epidemic levels of violence Native American women face. Read more about my bill in @bistribhttps://goo.gl/HfPTEz

For years, I've been working to combat crime, violence & human trafficking in Indian Country, and that includes introducing Savanna's Act which would help combat crisis of missing & murdered Native American women. #NotInvisible #MMIWpic.twitter.com/mmiJolmuAm

Mona Lisa was kind & caring. Her family has lived for 38 yrs without the closure & justice they deserve. Share her story, show your support, & together we can work to combat the crisis of missing & murdered Native American women. #NotInvisible #MMIW https://goo.gl/qNCqxw pic.twitter.com/S2aRZKQUkv

Combating the crisis of missing & murdered Native American women is about hope, justice & letting Native women across the country know that they're #NotInvisible - and that’s what Savanna’s Act aims to help dopic.twitter.com/ydaSBo6sti

After 25 years, Monica Wickre's family wants justice for their daughter, sister & mother. Too many families likes Monica's are forced to live without answers and closure. Monica deserves better. #NotInvisible #MMIW https://goo.gl/QGRG5u pic.twitter.com/i1kY3mEfp9
Thank you for helping raise awareness about this critical issue!

On my podcast, 'The Hotdish,' spoke w/ experts & advocates about their work to help indigenous women overcome obstacles & hardships & my bill, Savanna's Act, which aims to help. Listen & learn more here: https://goo.gl/rBxZwb  #NotInvisible #MMIW

Stella Marie Trottier-Graves from Belcourt lived an adventurous & fearless life & was loved by all who met her. But 17 years later and her family has no justice. These are the stories that need to be heard. Please share. #NotInvisible #MMIW https://goo.gl/t1TAQV pic.twitter.com/JAt1wz4w3a

Introduced bipartisan bill, Savanna's Act, that would help us begin addressing the crisis of missing & murdered Native American women. During cmte hearing, I stressed why this is all of our problem, and why we need to take action to stop it. #NotInvisible #MMIWpic.twitter.com/o4oxVJVHos

Native women and girls face a crisis of exploitation, violence & murder and it has to stop. This epidemic is known all too well in Indian Country b/c so many are directly impacted. Today we're standing together to say that these women are #NotInvisible. Join us. #MMIWpic.twitter.com/FKBsjuOdIH

84% of Native American women experience violence in their lifetime & on some reservations, they are murdered at 10x the national avg. These women are #NotInvisible & we need to shine a light on these crimes. Join me today to show your support & help raise awareness. #MMIWpic.twitter.com/jiycuoPGZC
Learn about my effort to raise awareness about the crisis of missing & murdered Native American women on Facebook Live, and please join in our effort today #NotInvisible https://goo.gl/sJ67Fr

Wonderful to join Susan Carter, @JohannaWriter, & so many incredible female leaders @NatlWomansParty to celebrate women's progress toward equality & the the role of women in society.pic.twitter.com/ASYjlQrPmf
Great meeting with @AirForceAssoc about the important role of the @usairforce in the security of the nation & the pivotal role of the work done at @TeamMinot & @319ABWpic.twitter.com/BCk5dOQB1N
Talked about NAFTA & how any renegotiation or withdrawal must take into account the needs of agriculture producers with folks from the Canada-US Inter-Parliamentary Group.pic.twitter.com/UtC8tA59dr
Met with folks from @iupat82 to discuss workforce challenges in ND & how we can create & support a workforce for the future.pic.twitter.com/jzA4rXOv4I

Long said I'll work w/GOP & Dems on tax reform that supports workers, families, & retirees, while growing the economy and staying fiscally responsible. Both sides have common concerns, and if we work together, we could find meaningful reform.
Joined moderate Democratic senators to call on GOP to work with us on tax reform so we can achieve a lasting result that provides permanency & predictabilitypic.twitter.com/YNR7hhLnsN
Last week in Bismarck w/workers & retirees, I unveiled a new bill I helped write & introduce that would make sure folks got the pensions they earned. More via @KXMBhttps://goo.gl/444cv8
Opioid abuse is tearing apart homes & communities in ND & across the country. Read @bistrib story on how I'm pushing for needed resources to prevent and combathttps://goo.gl/q7ZEE8

Thanks @gfherald for highlighting how important it is that Congress pass the bill I helped write & introduce to hold websites like Backpage accountable for their roles in online sex traffickinghttps://goo.gl/PSrZK5

As we gather w/family for Thanksgiving, encourage folks to thank the #vets & servicemembers who sacrifice for the liberties we celebratepic.twitter.com/uytsVVUHnU
Thousands of hard-working North Dakotans were promised their retirements would be safe. Watch this @KXMB video to see how I’m fighting against potentially devastating cuts.http://bit.ly/2hWubeH
Read this @Bistrib story on a rally I held with 100 ND workers & retirees to announce a bill to protect their pensionshttp://bit.ly/2jMj34t
Met w/@UnitedTribesND President Russ McDonald to talk about solutions to help make higher education more affordable & accessible.pic.twitter.com/GP7TOnIsrd
Follow me on @snapchat to see more from today's event w/workers & retirees in Bismarck about my bill to make sure they get their hard-earned pensionspic.twitter.com/YtvswHNfC3

Read some of the many stories I've heard from the 2,000 ND workers/retirees whose pensions are being threatened - this shouldn't be happening in America. And I'll fight every day to make sure it doesn't under my watch.https://goo.gl/TEKQmq

.@BranickQuality's Duane Brasch from Fargo knows how important it is that Congress quickly pass my bill so that his employees get the pensions and retirement security they've worked for for decades.pic.twitter.com/XRUmSieOcy

Mark Lundeby from Grand Forks knows that if Congress doesn't act quick to pass my bill to protect workers & retirees' pensions, that his family's financial security is in jeopardy. We must pass my bill & stand w/retirees like Mark.pic.twitter.com/NojpW9CYJV

Like many Teamsters, Mark Rothschiller from Bismarck gave up time with his family & holidays knowing that he could make up for it during his retirement. Without my bill, Mark will spend his retirement worrying about how to pay his health care billspic.twitter.com/4L36gfwMFM

Dennis Kooren from Fargo said this fight is about more than just pensions - it's about dignity & justice for workers & retires who played by the rules only to have the rug ripped from under them. I agree w/Dennis & that's why I helped write this billpic.twitter.com/otK5hg4NAi

Tony Goetzfried from Bismarck spoke about how so many Teamsters gave up decent wages & pay raises with the promise of a pension. He reinforced how my bill would make sure folks got what they earnedpic.twitter.com/PpkD7Ba6qU

After getting offered twice the salary & the 'best retirement in the country' Wayne Odegaard from Ruby left his job as a teacher to be a UPS driver. Now, 30 years later, his hard earned pension is being threatened - but my bill would stop that from happening.pic.twitter.com/PCVTSX2LxZ

My bill would help folks like Donna Mattson from Fargo & her husband, Mike. Mike worked hard his entire life with the promise of a pension & without it she doesn't know how they'll survive.pic.twitter.com/eNFeFAm18u
ICYMI - joined workers/retirees in Bismarck to announce a new bill I helped write to make sure they get their hard-earned pensions. Watch it here: https://goo.gl/WxKF1q

Today the president carried on the tradition of pardoning @PrezTurkey. This year's turkey, Drumstick, was raised by Carl Wittenburg from Wyndmere whose late father, Wally, was my good friend. What a small world!pic.twitter.com/Cji3fz6Apm

Today at 1pm CT, watch livestream on my Facebook page as I speak with 50+ workers & retirees in Bismarck to announce a bill I helped write & introduce to make sure retirees who paid into Central States Pension Fund can keep the pensions they earned. https://www.facebook.com/SenatorHeidiHeitkamp/ …

Great to join about 300 folks at the ND Association of Soil Conservation Districts' annual meeting today to highlight how I'll fight to make sure the 2018 #FarmBill invests in research & conservationpic.twitter.com/uJ4MentWq4

Privileged to announce 8 incredibly talented & smart NDans who I nominated to attend our nation’s military academies. Each of them are hardworking, determined, and eager to serve. #NDPridepic.twitter.com/mhVdQp4ohK

PTC has spurred wind energy boom in ND -creating good-paying jobs & supporting economy. House GOP tax bill would gut PTC deal I made & was signed into law in 2015, & would stop wind projects/investments from moving forwardhttps://goo.gl/txzmFs

Encouraging that ND business & national groups overwhelmingly support my bill that would reduce the burden of the Health Insurance Tax. . This bill would mitigate the negative impact the tax would have on ~71,000 #smallbiz & ~200,000 workers who would see their premiums increasepic.twitter.com/WSWg4SoY9G

Coal miners, teamsters & American workers worked hard & played by the rules & I'll keep fighting to make sure they get what was promised & earned. Discussed this w/@MineWorkers todaypic.twitter.com/vCPES8oR58

Most NDans live in rural areas meaning that rural health care is critical for families & communities. Today for #NationalRuralHealthDay, I want to thank the professionals who continue to provide top-notch care for rural patients. #PowerOfRuralpic.twitter.com/tZe0TjJeHB

So great to meet Rebecca & her daughter w/@FamilyVoices. @SenKaineOffice told me once that after thanking the group for their work, Rebecca reminded him that they have to fight for their kids every day. Incredible story & an incredible family.https://twitter.com/woodra/status/931006957300998144 …

Met w/@ndrealtors to talk about how tax reform must level the playing field, make it easier & less costly to file taxes, & grow the economypic.twitter.com/S8mmyIvBM9

New @Chapin_Hall study found that 1 in 10 young adults experience homelessness over 1 year, & at least 1 in 30 adolescents btwn 13-17. This reinforces need for #RHYA to help #EndYouthHomelessnesspic.twitter.com/W7bpMZNjWu

After a 10 month deployment, 60 @NDNationalGuard servicemembers are coming home this week. Words can't describe how grateful I am for their service & sacrifice - and everything their families gave up for our nation.pic.twitter.com/SLstcSzeSN
Appreciate the kids from the Bismarck Early Childhood Education Program sending me Thanksgiving art to help get my Washington, DC office in the holiday spirit.pic.twitter.com/Q8E9J6IAdZ

With majority of Senate Homeland Security Cmte, I voted to advance Kirstjen Nielsen's nomination to lead @DHSgov. At Senate hearing last week, Nielsen committed to prioritizing security improvements at Northern Border. https://goo.gl/VWPJwH pic.twitter.com/En6r7QdDJI

Proud to have support from ND bankers for bipartisan bill I helped negotiate that would provide relief for community banks & credit unions, protect & support consumers, & boost economic growth. More in @MinotDailyNews https://goo.gl/u93Fb7

No parent or family should have to worry about having to file bankruptcy because their child gets hurt or becomes sick. It’s past time Congress takes action and reauthorizes CHIP.pic.twitter.com/Q8Kxubtntq

This bill would support consumers & rural communities by freeing up burdensome regulations on community banks and credit unions which are key lenders to consumers in small, rural towns.pic.twitter.com/l5EF5y90IK
Our bill is an example of how I try to work every day to get results for North Dakota in the U.S. Senate.pic.twitter.com/9hpkYbcYPv

After 3 years of negotiations, this bipartisan bill is an example of how Republicans and Democrats can work together to reach real, tangible results through compromise – particularly in these partisan times.

Bipartisan deal I helped negotiate to provide relief for community banks & credit unions, protect & support consumers, & boost economic growth already has support from 9 Republicans, 8 Dems, & 1 Independent. Read more in @politico https://goo.gl/LfCx9e pic.twitter.com/yu1vmsnYjx

Every day I come to work in the US Senate, I'm fighting for rural America  - & that's what the bipartisan deal w/@MikeCrapo @SenDonnelly @SenatorTester @MarkWarner to reduce burdens on community banks is all about

Big news: Helped negotiate bipartisan deal to improve financial regulatory framework, support consumers & promote economic growth. Our bipartisan bill would provide needed relief to community banks & credit unions while also strengthening protections for consumerspic.twitter.com/Gmrvbz9rRw

& I introduced a strong bill to help mitigate the detrimental impact exposure to trauma could have on kids, especially in Indian Country
But we can change this. Programs like Generation Art Space are taking important steps to help Native children overcome challenges they faced
Suicide is the 2nd leading cause of death for Native youth & 22% experience post-traumatic stress–same rate as newly returning veterans
Children who experience 6 or more traumatic events are 30-times more likely to attempt suicide
Kids who have 4+ traumatic experiences have 3X the lifetime risk of heart disease & lung cancer and a 20-year difference in life expectancy
Trauma is the negative impact stressful events like violence, abuse, or neglect can have on kids. It can lead to lifelong harmful effects
Visited Generation Art Space on Turtle Mountain today which helps children on reservations overcome traumatic experiences & heal through art
Touring Seven Stone Center for Behavior Health & Wellness discussing how we can best address trauma in Native communitiespic.twitter.com/vxykN8zGFu

Initiatives to help #veterans start #ag businesses is important part of the #FarmBill.
Supporting new farmers is imp. for the longevity of the industry- #FarmBill provides new farmers & ranchers w/ access to training & capital.
The #FarmBill supports #research to promote new #agriculture innovations & help put our farmers & ranchers on the cutting edge.
#FarmBill provides retroactive and permanent livestock disaster program – crucial for ND ranchers impacted by severe Oct storm.
The #FarmBill includes assistance w/ conservation for ranchers, Devils Lake farmers & water retention in the Red River Valley.
The #FarmBill includes rural development initiatives to help rural areas, like ND, upgrade infrastructure.
#FarmBill enables ND to build on strong ag exports. ND has $4.1 billion in annual ag exports which support 45,000+ jobs in our state.
The #FarmBill is a jobs bill - it supports 16 million American jobs & reduces the federal deficit by more than $23 billion.
And today #Congress passed a bipartisan #FarmBill, that includes key provisions for NDans, that will be sent to Pres.& signed into law(2/2)

One of many important reasons are why my 1st bill would move forward a long overdue conv. on how we can better protect Native kids. (2/2)
We don't just have a moral obligation to fix the serious disparities Native Children face, we have a treaty & trust responsibility. (1/2)
We need to stand up for ALL of our children. But too often we are turning our backs on Native children throughout the US. That needs to stop
Native children are the most at-risk population in the US, facing disparities in edu., health & safety. My bill aims to change that. (2/2)
Stats on Native children: 37% live in poverty. Suicide rates are 2.5X the nat'l avg. Child mortality has gone up 15%. HS grad rate ~50%(1/2)

Thanks for all your thoughtful questions about Syria. I'll hold more Twitter town halls in the future. #AskHeidiHpic.twitter.com/syESVk89cl
.@Benjamin_D Strong internationall coalition - as I had called for - will get our point across that CW use is not acceptable. #AskHeidiH
.@DonsSweetLeaf Came back to DC to join classified briefings & it was clear to me the Assad regime used CW - heinous crime. #AskHeidiH
.@onthevirgil We don't use chem. weapons. In 1993, the US pledged to get rid of its chem. weapons arsenal. #AskHeidiH
.@SilverScarCat We're trying to prevent the use of CW so no other country believes it can use them against us or their own. #AskHeidiH
.@tcwirtz Our focus is on preventing use of CW, not getting involved in a civil war in Syria. #AskHeidiH
.@liamthrailkill We don't want to involve US in a civil war in the Middle East. Preventing use of CW is important for us all. #AskHeidiH
.@gr8tdanemom4 Thx for your family's service. We must thoroughly vet any group that will receive US military support in Syria. #AskHeidiH
.@CollinTHanson My top priority is making sure a diplomatic, international solution works. #AskHeidiH
.@Chipperod I participated in many classified briefings & its was very clear the Assad regime used CW against its own people. #AskHeidiH
.@msprairierose In our best interest to work with the int'l community. Need entire world, not just US, to enforce int'l norms. #AskHeidiH
.@SilverScarCat I do not support the current resolution b/c it calls for force w/o carefully looking at diplomatic solutions. #AskHeidiH
.@HannahWol We now need to verify the Assad regime will turn over 100% of its CW. That’s what Sec. Kerry is now working to do. #AskHeidiH
.@caseydawn3 It’s in all of our interests to make sure using chemical weapons is never acceptable. But I want peaceful solution. #AskHeidiH
.@ErnieEmily Don’t think we should resort to force & strongly pushed for a diplomatic solution which we’re now seeing. #AskHeidiH
.@evanoby To prevent any country from using chem. weapons against US, we must make sure they can’t be used anywhere. #AskHeidiH
.@AmandaBreen23 Need to carefully look at diplomatic solutions & build more int’l support before looking at military action. #AskHeidiH
.@Flufferwuffer Then up to UN and US to verify Assad regime turns over all chem. weapons & work to destroy them. #AskHeidiH
.@MikkiJenson b/c if Syria uses CW w/o any response from int’l community, what would prevent Iran or North Korea from the same? #AskHeidiH
.@maxbuchholz The timelines have been set forth in the framework. See here: http://www.state.gov/r/pa/prs/ps/2013/09/214247.htm … #AskHeidiH
.@BrentJaenicke Solving international crises through diplomacy is better for everyone.
.@BrianViall Success means that Syria's chemical weapons are destroyed, hopefully through diplomatic means. #AskHeidiH
.@YAndrewJ Putin cannot be trusted. US-Russia deal to get rid of Syria’s chem. weapons is good news, but we have to see action. #AskHeidiH
.@carterbhill We need the entire world, not just US, to prevent conflicts & deter the use of chemical weapons anywhere. #AskHeidiH
.@KaisaLundgren It’s in all of our strategic interest to make sure no one is allowed to use chem. weapons against against anyone. #AskHeidiH
